statements: SELECT * FROM medications;
SELECT medication_name, expiration_date FROM medications WHERE medication_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT medication_name, packaging_lot_number FROM medications WHERE storage_conditions LIKE '%dry%';
SELECT medication_id, medication_name, expiration_date FROM medications ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE medication_id = 1;
SELECT medication_name, expiration_date FROM medications WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE storage_conditions LIKE '%dry%' ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT medication_id, medication_name FROM medications ORDER BY medication_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT medication_id, packaging_lot_number FROM medications WHERE packaging_lot_number IS NOT NULL AND expiration_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM medications;
SELECT id, name, expiration_date FROM medications ORDER BY name;
SELECT id, name, storage_temperature FROM medications WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM packaging WHERE medication_id = 3;
SELECT packaging_id, expiration_date FROM packaging ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31'
SELECT name, storage_temperature FROM medications ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT p.id, m.name, p.packaging_id, p.expiration_date FROM packaging p JOIN medications m ON p.medication_id = m.id
SELECT name, storage_temperature FROM medications WHERE storage_temperature = 'Cold'

SELECT m.name AS MedicationName, p.packaging_id AS PackagingID, p.expiration_date AS PackagingExpirationDate FROM medications m JOIN packaging p ON m.id = p.medication_id ORDER BY p.expiration_date DESC
SELECT * FROM medications;
SELECT name, expiration_date FROM medications WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, packaging_details FROM medications WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, medication_id, administration_date FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT name, expiration_date FROM medications WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY expiration_date DESC
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age >= 18 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT p.name AS patient_name, m.name AS medication_name, cr.administration_date FROM patients p JOIN compliance_records cr ON p.id = cr.patient_id JOIN medications m ON cr.medication_id = m.id

SELECT p.name AS patient_name, m.name AS medication_name, cr.compliance_status FROM patients p JOIN compliance_records cr ON p.id = cr.patient_id JOIN medications m ON cr.medication_id = m.id WHERE cr.compliance_status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM medications;
SELECT medication_id, medication_name FROM medications;
SELECT medication_name, expiration_date FROM medications WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;

SELECT tracking_id, medication_name, patient_name, check_in_time FROM medications JOIN medication_tracking ON medications.medication_id = medication_tracking.medication_id JOIN patients ON medication_tracking.patient_id = patients.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT packaging_id, packaging_date, expiration_date FROM packaging ORDER BY packaging_date DESC;
SELECT medication_name, expiration_date FROM medications WHERE expiration_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT patients.patient_id, patients.patient_name, medication_name FROM patients JOIN medications ON patients.patient_id = medications.medication_id;

SELECT packaging.packaging_id, packaging.medication_id, medications.medication_name, patients.patient_name FROM packaging JOIN medications ON packaging.medication_id = medications.medication_id JOIN patients ON packaging.packaging_id = patients.patient_id ORDER BY packaging.packaging_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM medications;
SELECT medication_id, medication_name FROM medications WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT pharmacy_name, location FROM pharmacy ORDER BY pharmacy_name DESC;
SELECT prescription_id, medication_id, pharmacy_id, quantity FROM prescriptions WHERE quantity >= 10;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM medications;
SELECT medication_name, expiration_date FROM medications ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT medication_name, expiration_date FROM medications WHERE medication_id = 1;
SELECT pharmacy_name, location FROM pharmacy WHERE location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
